title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furniture Schedule, First Floor Living Room", 1937-1938
medium: Graphite, red and blue color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite and red color pencil, upper center: FURNITURE SCHEDULE ANDERSON HOUSE; upper left in blue color pencil: FIRST FLOOR; dimensions, materials, descriptions in graphite
description: Furniture schedule for first floor detailing room, piece, drawing number, quantity, size, woods, finish, interiors, hardware, upholstery specimans and yardage, fabrics, glass mirror, lighting electrical, and remarks.
